unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Important for us farmers, especially with unpredictable weather like this year. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is helping many in Maharashtra after the floods on 26/07/2023. My cousin, Ramesh from Nashik, got some Rs. 5000 last year. Hope it covers losses due to the dry spell this time. Applying before 31/07/2024, right? Need it badly at 17:00 hrs, yaar! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Important for us farmers, especially with unpredictable weather like this year. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana is helping many in Maharashtra after the floods on twenty sixth july two thousand and twenty three. My cousin, Ramesh from Nashik, got some rupee five thousand last year. Hope it covers losses due to the dry spell this time. Applying before thirty first july two thousand and twenty four, right? Need it badly at seventeen hundred hours, yaar! Jai Kisan!
